svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Global primary energy share by source
Global primary energy consumption shown by the share of contribution from each energy source. Here, traditional
biomass is not included. 'Other renewables' is the aggregate of all renewable technologies excluding solar, wind and
hydropower (e.g. geothermal, modern biofuels and tidal).
Source: BP Statistical Review of World Energy (2018)
